By sharing
#InsideSSGroupstories,
 we hope to spark inspiration and connection.

In the fast-paced world of skincare and fashion, we’ve learned that the little things shape the bigger picture. Every moments matters. Each day, we begin with good vibes, and genuine check-ins. As deadlines loom and ideas fly, what keeps us grounded is the care we extend to one another.

SS Group Indonesia - Company Values

Our core values shape the way we work at SS Group—driving every innovation, collaboration, and strategic decision.

Beauty Empowerment

We believe that every individual has the potential to shine. Through our fashion and beauty products, SS Group is committed to empowering people to feel confident and express their true selves.

Purposeful Innovation

Innovation is at the core of everything we do. By staying attuned to trends and customer needs, we consistently deliver innovative products that offer real, relevant solutions in the world of beauty and fashion.

Integrity

We conduct our business with honesty, transparency, and responsibility. Integrity guides every decision and action we take, building strong trust with our customers, partners, and communities.

Customer-Centric Excellence

Customer satisfaction is our top priority. We listen, understand, and respond to our customers with outstanding service and high-quality products—ensuring a fulfilling experience at every touchpoint.

Collaboration

Our success is rooted in solid teamwork. We value each individual's contribution and foster cross-functional collaboration to achieve our shared goals with a spirit of togetherness.

SS Group Indonesia - Company Culture

At SS Group, our culture is rooted in openness, collaboration, and a growth mindset—where great ideas and exceptional talent come together.

Authenticity

We believe that beauty starts with being true to yourself. At SS Group, we embrace diversity in all its forms, ideas, styles, and personalities. You are encouraged to express your authentic self every day.

Fast Pace

The world of fashion and skincare evolves rapidly—and so do we. At SS Group, speed meets synergy. We stay agile and collaborative to respond to trends and opportunities with confidence.

Creative

Creativity fuels our growth. Whether you're in product design, marketing, or operations, you are empowered to challenge norms and bring fresh ideas to life.

Relentless

We are a learning-driven company. Curiosity is part of our DNA. Through feedback, mentorship, and shared experiences, we grow better individually and collectively.

Transparency

Transparency builds trust. We value honest, respectful conversations across levels, functions, and ideas. Everyone’s voice matters.

Caring

We care about people as well. From product development to packaging and CSR, we make thoughtful choices that reflect our commitment to well-being to create impactful steps not only for the success of company but also for others.

Passionate

What we do isn’t just work, it’s craft. We are proud builders of a brand that empowers others through fashion and beauty. Passion is present in everything we do.

Authenticity

We believe that beauty starts with being true to yourself. At SS Group, we embrace diversity in all its forms, ideas, styles, and personalities. You are encouraged to express your authentic self every day.
